body.p: As a new hire, I wanted to understand how my small software development team and I would produce user documentation. After a few months on the job, I was able to grasp the role that I needed to play but also the role that teammates would need to play in the user documentation life cycle. This workflow is what I presented to clear up any confusion about who does what, how user documentation is authored, the format of review documents, and how comments are documented.
